title: Bayer North Asia Spearheads Radiology Revolution with AI Integration
description: In a groundbreaking move to redefine the landscape of medical imaging, Bayer, a pharmaceutical giant, is positioning itself at the forefront of radiology innovation. With a robust performance, Bayer’s commitment to driving innovation is evident in its strategic moves, including the development of novel MRI contrast agents like gadoquatrane and the incorporation of cutting-edge artificial ...
